description: This Kotlin source file defines the NotesFragment class, which manages the UI for displaying, filtering, and interacting with a list of notes in an Android app. It handles user actions such as searching, pinning, favoriting, deleting notes, and navigating to the note editor.

classes.name: NotesFragment
classes.description: Manages the display and interaction of a list of notes, including search, pinning, favoriting, and deletion functionalities.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the repository instance when the fragment is created.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment layout and sets up the RecyclerView and adapter.

methods.name: onResume
methods.description: Reloads data when the fragment resumes.

methods.name: onSearchQuery
methods.description: Handles search queries to filter notes.

methods.name: loadData
methods.description: Fetches notes from the repository based on current search query and updates the UI.

methods.name: showLoading
methods.description: Shows or hides the loading progress indicator.

methods.name: onNoteClicked
methods.description: Opens the NoteEditorActivity for the selected note.

methods.name: onNoteMenuClicked
methods.description: Displays a popup menu with options to pin/unpin, favorite/unfavorite, or delete the note.

methods.name: confirmDelete
methods.description: Shows a confirmation dialog before deleting a note.
